title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for definite integral

1 point is deducted for incorrect limits

1 point is deducted for reversal

1 point is earned for anti derivative

1 point is earned for evaluation

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for definite integral

2 points are deducted for faulty f, g, or u

1 point is earned for correct antiderivative

1 point is earned for evaluation of anti derivative
